expand-trigger.description: Expand the trigger method, and the optional value is click
expand-trigger.type: 展开触发方式，可选值 click
expand-trigger.description_zh: 展开触发方式，可选值 click

line-clamp.description: Maximum number of lines to display, see [line-clamp](https://caniuse.com/?search=line-clamp) for compatibility
line-clamp.type: 最大显示行数，兼容性见 line-clamp
line-clamp.description_zh: 最大显示行数，兼容性见 [line-clamp](https://caniuse.com/?search=line-clamp)

tooltip.description: Tooltip component configuration for deep customization. For ease of use, 'sameWidth' defaults to true here
tooltip.type: Tooltip 组件配置，用于深度定制。为了更方便使用，sameWidth 在这里默认为 true
tooltip.description_zh: Tooltip 组件配置，用于深度定制。为了更方便使用，`sameWidth` 在这里默认为 true
